name: Tsumineko AR
description:
“Tsumineko” became AR!

“Tsumineko” is a game of stacking many, many cats on top of one-another to form a tower of cats high into the sky.
This is a fun game loved by both kids and grown-ups around the globe.

【Normal mode】
1. You can only stack the cats in a single vertical line.
2. Once you have placed a cat, you can not change the position so carry on stacking.
3. It is important to tilt your iPhone to take balance, but you need to be careful not to over do it!

As much as possvible stack the cats!

【Photo mode】
1. You can only stack the cats in a single vertical line.
2. Once you have placed a cat, you can not change the position so carry on stacking.
3. You can stack until the cat in the balloon is empty.
4. If you want to quit please press the top left button to return.

Perfect for photography!

When you press the camera button on the top right, you can take a screenshot and save it.
Let's stack the cats against your favorite place!

Enjoy!
